question: Regarding Life insurance & Disability Insurance
answer:
QUESTION
Respected Mufti Sahib, My employer offers life insurance and disability insurance benefits. I am not sure if as a Muslim, I should enroll in such policies? Please assist me. Jazakallah!
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissable to take out any conventional insurance policy as it
has elementts of interesst and gambling in it.

Mufti E. Desai
